query.description: Natural language research question or task description.

max_steps.description: Optional cap on iterative reasoning/tool steps.

context.description: Structured context or hints forwarded to the research agent.

metadata.description: Opaque metadata echoed back with the result payload.

notebook_id.description: Notebook UUID to receive the research summary.

title_prefix.description: Optional prefix appended to the Notebook source title.

embed.description: Whether Notebook should embed the content during ingestion.

async_processing.description: If true, Notebook may process the source asynchronously.
